content: We achieved another record high net revenues of RMB96.5 billion for the full year, up 10% year-over-year with games and related value added services coming in at RMB74.6 billion for 2020 also up 10% year-over-year. Despite the high base in 2021, total net revenues from our gains and related VAS continued year-over-year growth in the first quarter, reaching RMB19.1 billion increase of 2% year-over-year. Youdao net revenues for 2022 reached RMB5 billion and in the fourth quarter were up 9% year-over-year to reach RMB1.5 billion RMB, primarily due to increased sales of our new services and smart devices. NetEase's cloud music's net revenues were RMB9 billion for the full year up, 29% year-over-year and up 26% year-over-year in the fourth quarter to reach RMB2.4 billion. Total revenues for innovative businesses and others were RMB7.9 billion for the year up 7% year-over-year and in Q4, this segment recorded RMB2.4 billion net revenues up 3% year-over-year, mainly due to increased revenue contribution from Yanxuan. Taking a closer look, our selling and marketing expenses as a percentage of total net revenues were largely stable year-over-year, both for the fourth quarter and for the full year at 13.5% and 13.9% respectively. Our R&D expenses as a percentage of total net revenues also remain stable year-over-year at 16.1% in the fourth quarter, compared with 15.8% for the same period last year.
